verse:
एको वशी निष्क्रियाणां बहूनामेकं बीजं बहुधा यः करोति।
तमात्मस्थं येऽनुपश्यन्ति धीरास्तेषां सुखं शाश्वतं नेतरेषाम्‌॥

terms.तमात्मस्थं: the one situated in the self

meaning: One controlling the many, the seed among the inactive, who in many ways does, the wise perceive that eternal happiness in themselves, not for others.
